title: Almost every game i play crashes if I try to alt tab while playing in fullscreen, what's going on?
body: I have an Nvidia 940 mx driver, latest version. This started happening recently. I dont know what's going on, my entire computer crashes, not just the game, and only in fullscreen. :(

replies.body:
Heya, what happens if you tap Alt+Enter when the match starts?  This should swap you from full screen to windowed.  If that fixes it, there could be driver or setting issues causing this crash.  Firstly, see if resetting your config settings can help by resetting your resolution settings:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Make sure to test it in a custom so you don't get any penalties.  You may also want to go over the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help make sure that your settings are tuned up.
